methods.name: getMaxStackSize
javadoc: Returns the maximum stack size for a given slot (usually the same as getInventoryStackLimit(), but 1 in the case of armor slots)

methods.name: isActive
javadoc: Actualy only call when we want to render the white square effect over the slots. Return always True, except for the armor slot of the Donkey/Mule (we can't interact with the Undead and Skeleton horses)

methods.name: mayPlace
javadoc: Check if the stack is allowed to be placed in this slot, used for armor slots as well as furnace fuel.
